snippet: American media outlets rushed reporters to Paris, while networks shifted their programming in the wake of the killings.

byline.contributor: Emily Steel contributed reporting from Des Moines, Sydney Ember and Ravi Somaiya from New York, and Mark Scott from Rome.

lead_paragraph: American media outlets rushed reporters to Paris, while networks shifted their programming in the wake of the killings.

headline.main: News Media Scrambles to Cover Paris Shootings
